description:
puffies. is a puzzle game that reimagines the classic jigsaw experience with a charmingly nostalgic twist of puffy stickers. Solve engaging levels of varying difficulty by combining fun, hand-designed puffy stickers and building a stunning collection along the way.

STICKER COLLECTIONS & PACK VOLUMES
Unlock sticker packs of various themes, sizes, difficulty levels, and volumes to build your unique puffy collection. Each collection is thoughtfully designed by our in-house artists.

RANKING SYSTEM & TASKS
Sharpen your skills and grow your puffy sticker collection by completing tasks, earning points, and climbing the ranks. 

DAILY CHALLENGES
Return each day to tackle fun Daily Challenges and boost your score. Daily Challenges are available for 24 hours only, so don't miss out!

ACCESSIBILITY FEATURES
puffies. offers a range of accessibility features that make puzzle-solving easier and create a more comfortable gameplay experience for kids, players with visual impairments, motion sensitivity, and more.

RELAXING & FAMILY FRIENDLY 
puffies. is a family-friendly game designed for players of all genders and ages to enjoy. The game offers a relaxing and stress-free experience that you can jump into anytime.
